channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Sur Steam aussi, les processeurs Intel reprennent des couleurs
item.description: La dernière enquête de matériel Steam Survey fait état d'une quantité de machines équipées de processeurs Intel légèrement plus importante qu'un mois auparavant. Une nouvelle toujours bonne à prendre pour l'équipe bleue après une longue période de déclin en la matière.

item.title: These 10 Automatic Cat Feeders Were the Best We Tested (2026)
item.description: We tested some of the most popular automatic dry- and wet-food pet feeders to see which ones are worth the money.

item.title: Get one month of the Disney+ and Hulu bundle for only $10
item.description: You have the best chance to save on streaming services during the holiday shopping season, but throughout the year, the occasional deal pops up that's worth considering. Case in point: this new Disney+ deal. New and eligible returning subscribers can sign up for the Disney+ Hulu bundle (with ads) for $10 for one month of access. That's $3 off the usual price of the bundle for one month, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the cost of each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't qui...

item.title: The ‘Eragon’ Dragon Fantasy Series Is Still Alive at Disney+
item.description: After Brandon Sanderson's 'Cosmere' pickup at Apple TV, series based on hit fantasy books are having a big moment.

item.title: Sony's holiday PS5 sales dropped 16 percent compared to last year
item.description: Sony has now shipped 92.2 million PlayStation 5 consoles in total around the world, but sales were down sharply over the holiday season compared to last year. In its latest earnings report, the company said it shipped eight million PS5s during its key third quarter, 1.5 million (16 percent) lower than in the same period last year. The gaming division still made more profit, though, thanks to a boost in software sales and a low yen.Sony’s first two quarters this fiscal year saw an increase in PS5s sold, so the holiday decline is a bit surprising. That said, sales during the same period the prev...

item.title: Sur cette exoplanète, des tsunamis de vagues de lave géantes défient tout ce que l’on croyait possible
item.description: Le cosmos ne cesse de nous surprendre et la diversité que l'on a constatée avec les planètes et les lunes du Système solaire semble bel et bien se prolonger au fur et à mesure que l'on explore le monde des exoplanètes. Celui de la super-Terre 55 Cancri e est peut-être encore plus dantesque qu'on...

item.title: Another European government agency is preparing to ditch Microsoft if needed
item.description: Estonia says it's not planning to switch off its Microsoft partnership, but it's ready to leave if anything changes.

item.title: Après la polémique sur les images pédopornographiques, Grok est attaqué de toute part en Europe
item.description: Les délits commis par Grok, l’intelligence artificielle d’Elon Musk, semblent faire réagir les autorités de ce côté de l’Atlantique. La récente polémique sur la création d’images pédopornographiques par le robot a réveillé les législateurs de Bruxelles et d’ailleurs.

item.title: Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase live build-up: gearing up for the latest Switch 2 game announcements today
item.description: Join us for the latest news, rumors, and speculation in the build up to today's Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase.

item.title: How to stream the 2026 Super Bowl for free: Patriots vs. Seahawks time, where to watch and more
item.description:
The 2026 Super Bowl between the New England Patriots and the Seattle Seahawks will air on NBC this Sunday, Feb. 8. The game will also stream on Peacock. If you don't have NBC over the air and don't subscribe to Peacock, there are still ways to watch Super Bowl LX — and Bad Bunny's history-making halftime show — for free. Here's how to tune in. How to watch Super Bowl LX free:
Date: Sunday, Feb. 8 Time: 6:30 p.m. ET Location: Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, Calif. TV channel: NBC, Telemundo Streaming: Peacock, DirecTV, NFL+ and more 2026 Super Bowl game channel Super Bowl LX will air on NBC...

item.title: Is Spotify the new Amazon? The platform now lets you buy physical books from the app – and its new Page Match tool lets you sync your audio books with the printed version
item.description: Spotify's new audiobook upgrades allow you to purchase physical books from the app and more, and it's now in competition with Amazon.

item.title: I'm a cloud storage expert and this Valentines Day 50% lifetime pCloud discount is making me fall in love all over again
item.description: Love is in the cloud - or at least it should be. Store all your precious memories safely with lifetime storage from pCloud.

item.title: Surfshark VPN deal: Get up to 87 percent off two-year plans
item.description: Surfshark’s One plan is heavily discounted right now, with an 87-percent discount on the two-year package, plus three extra months. The promo price comes out to $2.29 per month, or $62 for the first 27 months. We’ve generally liked Surfshark as a straightforward, speedy service for everyday use, and it’s one of the picks in our guide to the best VPNs. In our Surfshark review, we found it delivered excellent speeds overall and reliably unblocked Netflix across most of our test servers, which makes this long-term deal worth a look if you want a VPN deal that also includes extras like antivirus, ...

item.title: FBI foiled by the iPhone’s Lockdown Mode during raid on reporter’s home – here’s how it works
item.description: The FBI was unable to access a reporter’s iPhone after it was protected with Apple’s Lockdown Mode.

item.title: Massacre en cours sur le marché crypto : le Bitcoin continue sa chute libre sous les 70 000 dollars
item.description: Le Bitcoin vient de vivre un semaine particulièrement brutale. Le cours de la crypto s'est effondré sous les 70 000 dollars en quelques jours. Le marché crypto a enregistré une nouvelle vague de liquidations forcées, laissant les investisseurs exsangues.

item.title: Android gaming tablets are back: new Black Shark and Lenovo Legion models are on the way
item.description: The Xiaomi Black Shark Gaming Tablet and Lenovo Legion Y700 are both landing soon, giving gamers two new tablet options.

item.description: Playground Games a mis une claque à tout le monde en dévoilant Forza Horizon 6, un nouvel opus se déroulant au Japon, que vous pouvez d'ores et déjà précommander sur Xbox Series X chez Carrefour pour 54,99 euros.

item.description: Thread is a mesh networking protocol that connects low-power smart home gadgets, and it’s one of Matter’s underlying technologies.

item.title: Spotify’s Page Match syncs your audiobooks and your physical ones
item.description: Spotify has launched a new feature called Page Match that lets you quickly sync your spot in a physical or ebook with an audiobook. Point your camera at a page, and the Spotify app uses computer vision to match text with audio. If you have to jump behind the wheel for a long drive, but […]

item.title: Spotify is partnering with Bookshop.org to sell physical books
item.description: Spotify is going all in on books in 2026 and partnering with Bookshop.org to let you buy physical copies of audiobooks and support local retailers starting in the Spring. The announcement dovetails with the launch of Page Match, a new feature that lets you sync physical books and ebooks with audiobooks in the Spotify app […]

item.title: Spotify ventures into physical book sales, adds new audiobook features
item.description: Spotify users in the U.S. and the UK will soon be able to buy physical books in the app. There's also a new tool that syncs physical books to audiobooks.

item.title: Spotify's Page Match seamlessly swaps between real books and audiobooks
item.description: I have a love-hate relationship with Spotify that might just be leaning more towards love today. While I struggle with some of the company's choices about the type of content it allows on its platform, I have always had a soft spot for its Wrapped roundups and the monthly audiobook hours included with my Premium subscription. For those like me, Spotify’s news today will likely enhance the appeal of its audiobook offerings. It’s announcing a partnership with Bookshop.org — which lets indie bookstores sell their wares online through a unified platform — allowing users to buy physical books from ...

item.title: 'Overwatch is more than just a digit' — Overwatch 2 is losing the '2' as Blizzard announces major overhaul with 10 new heroes throughout the year and a Nintendo Switch 2 release
item.description: Blizzard has announced that it's dropping the "2" in Overwatch 2, alongside major plans for the hero shooter, which begins next month with the game's first year-long narrative titled "The Reign of Talon".

item.title: What the bedroom can teach the boardroom about healthy, thriving relationships
item.description: In both areas, success is built on the same six fundamental ingredients After more than two decades as a psychosexual therapist, I have learned to listen carefully for what people are not saying. When vulnerability is close to the surface, uncertainty shows up quickly. Am I doing this right? Do I belong here? What am I allowed to ask for, and what will it cost me if I do?...

item.title: Can 2026 finally be the year Black-owned businesses are covered for their accomplishments, not just DEI?
item.description: ‘This framing does a disservice not only to Black founders, but to readers and audiences as well.’ Over the past two years, a troubling trend has started to take shape in the media; for a large majority of journalists, DEI framing became the default for covering Black businesses.

item.title: « Je ne peux pas sortir » : comment ce mécanisme de secours méconnu sur les Tesla peut sauver votre vie en cas d’accident
item.description: Une Tesla Model Y accidentée a pris feu. Le conducteur, décédé, n'a pas pu sortir de la voiture. Les poignées électriques des portières sont mises en causes. Pendant ce temps, la Chine interdit ce genre de technologie et Tesla cherche à modifier leur design.

item.title: 'Overseas sales were slightly weaker than our expectations' — Nintendo president admits Switch 2 sales were stronger in Japan than in the West
item.description: Nintendo president Shuntaro Furukawa has told shareholders that Western sales for the Switch 2 were not as strong as they expected by the end of 2025, but sales in the West exceeded expectations.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 : quand et comment suivre la 60e finale de la NFL ?
item.description: Il n'y a pas que les JO d'hiver qui agiteront le monde du sport ce week-end, le 60e Super Bowl de l'histoire de la NFL est aussi au programme. Voici quand et comment suivre l'un des événements sportifs les plus populaires au monde.
